artist: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn; Pierre Louis Surugue
description: portrait of an elderly man seated in an arm chair; left hand resting on arm rest; right hand holding a stick; wearing a high cap and coat; seated before a curtain; Comte de Vence's coat of arms in lower margin
